data.prayer: Father, encourage the 17,360 believers in Sant Ravi Das Nagar to not just be consumers of knowledge but be producers of love, mercy, kindness, and justice.
data.verse: let us not love with words or speech but with actions and in truth.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Sant Ravi Das Nagar, Uttar Pradesh, India
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, remind the disciples in the county of Sant Ravi Das Nagar to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

data.section_summary: On average, 3 babies will be born in the next hour to families who are far from God in Sant Ravi Das Nagar, Uttar Pradesh, India.
data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to these new families.
Jesus, you taught Paul to train Timothy to train faithful men who would train others. Please, teach the church of Sant Ravi Das Nagar, Uttar Pradesh, India to do the same.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Father, please remove the barriers that keep the 1,541,691 who are far from you in Sant Ravi Das Nagar, Uttar Pradesh, India from having access to a Bible.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Jat Dalal (Muslim traditions) people. 0.0% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Father, we agree with your desire that the people in the county of Sant Ravi Das Nagar hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the county of Sant Ravi Das Nagar, Uttar Pradesh, India need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.focus_label: Sant Ravi Das Nagar, Uttar Pradesh, India
data.section_summary:
the county of Sant Ravi Das Nagar, Uttar Pradesh, India has a population of 1,578,200.

We estimate Sant Ravi Das Nagar has 17,360 people who might know Jesus, 19,149 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,541,691 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, make the Word of God a delight to the people of Sant Ravi Das Nagar, like it was to David.
data.verse: I delight in your decrees; I will not neglect your Word.
